entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Carberry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:15 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -5.9°C

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 8:03 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:03 PM CST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow and blowing snow. Low minus 11.
